title: MMA Training Design Project Based on Ecological Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Physical Fitness and Motor Control Skills, Experience with Project-Based Learning
context.additional_context: MMA training environment design project for physical activity enhancement among office/administrative workers. Practical education combining ecological dynamics framework-based training scenario development and mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can represent the dynamic system of MMA training environments as a mathematical model using an ecological dynamics framework.
Learners can design personalized training scenarios by analyzing individual physical conditions and constraints.
Learners can build a training environment resembling actual MMA competitions and develop evaluation metrics through PBL team projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
